lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I realize that I am privileged as a white male from the United States coming from a middle-upper class background, and that every human from any background has the same basic requirements (food, shelter, clean water, access to health care and education, etc.), and as such, those of us who come from a privileged background have a moral responsibility to show solidarity with their fellow human beings who don't have access to those basic human requirements.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Pacific Lutheran University. I am double-majoring in Hispanic Studies and Environmental Studies. After college, I hope to work abroad for a few years, perhaps interning on a permaculture farm in Mexico or somewhere in Latin America, working for the Peace Corps, working for an NGO or Non-Profit organization internationally, and/or going to graduate school.

I am now slowly withdrawing my funds from Kiva...

What a pity!!!

It's the right thing to do.  

Many of us live a life of privilege in the United States.  I have been fortunate to travel around the world and to be embraced, and humbled by the hospitality and kindness of those who have so much less in terms of material wealth and so much more to teach us about love towards each other, and the contributions we can make to our  communities, family and friends.

lenders.name: ossey joel alex
lenders.loan_because: create my own business
lenders.occupational_info:
Name, Address
YAPO Ossey Joel Alex
14 BP 2026 ABIDJAN 14
ABIDJAN
COTE D'IVOIRE 00225.
osseyalex@yahoo.fr

Subject: Loan Request
 
                                            Dear 
 
For some months now that I work on the project to create my own business. The project I am particularly interested in heart since I am convinced of its success. Indeed, I intend to start a transport company. I intend to have a fleet of three cars to transport individuals in Abidjan. Indeed Abidjan road is quite dense.Cependant it is insufficient for the transportation of individuals who move each day in Abidjan. Abidjan Car has just over 4 million. At the same transport company I intend to join an Internet cafe a qinzaine posts (computer).
  But today, I do not yet have all the money needed to finance my project to create activity. To complete your knowledge of this project, I enclose a cash flow forecast.
Each car will yield 30 000 CFAF per day.
is 90 by 000 CFAF for 3 cars.
What makes the euro around 130 euros per day.
After a taxi me reports 3 900 euros per me.
The charge and operating expenses for the 3 taxi stand at EUR 1 300 by me. Is 2600 euro gain from the operation of 3 taxis.
This gives a gain of about 30 000 euro.

cybercafé also bring CFAF 30 000 per day. which is equivalent to 900 000 CFAF by me. about 1 500 euro per me.
the operating costs of the cafe will be 500 euros per me. cybercafé bring 1 000 euro per me.
an increase of 12 000 euro

By combining the earnings of taxis and the cafe we have a monthly gain of about 3 600 euros. Which give approximately 42 000 euro prize.
I need to launch my business:
                                                                       18 000 euro for taxis
                                                                      10 000 euro for the cafe.
Either I need a total of 28 000 to start my business. The fact is that I can run separately.

Also I would like to publish this loan application in the hope that can have one or more who agree to participate in the launch of my business. I need financial assistance. Naturally, I am willing to pay an interest by the amount that you agree to m'avance. In order to do things in a transparent, it goes without saying that I am ready to send you an acknowledgment of debt in order to specify the dates and terms of repayment of any amount that you agree to lend me.
Of course, I ask you to receive my most distinguished salutations.
  In anticipation of your positive response, and renewing my thanks,
